Desc.entry: Offers free advice, information and support for voluntary and community organisations seeking funds for their work. Offers on-line services and resources to users including on-line funding search. Runs training courses to help groups get the skills they need to make good funding applications. Involved in the Sheffield Funding Forum Planning Group and produces Funding News. Offers a funding advisory service for groups that do not have access to professional fundraising expertise. Company limited by guarantee no 3030641.

Pubs.entry: Funding News (available to download); Annual Report; Various information sheets on funding related issues
